scripts.dev: node node_modules/.bin/concurrently -n "master-dash,master-agent,proxe-dash,proxe-agent,wind-dash,wind-agent" -c "blue,blue,green,green,cyan,cyan" "npm run dev:master-dash" "npm run dev:master-agent" "npm run dev:proxe-dash" "npm run dev:proxe-agent" "npm run dev:windchasers-dash" "npm run dev:windchasers-agent"
scripts.dev:master: node node_modules/.bin/concurrently -n "master-dash,master-agent" -c "blue,blue" "npm run dev:master-dash" "npm run dev:master-agent"
scripts.dev:proxe: node node_modules/.bin/concurrently -n "proxe-dash,proxe-agent" -c "green,green" "npm run dev:proxe-dash" "npm run dev:proxe-agent"
scripts.dev:windchasers: node node_modules/.bin/concurrently -n "wind-dash,wind-agent" -c "cyan,cyan" "npm run dev:windchasers-dash" "npm run dev:windchasers-agent"
scripts.build: npm run build:proxe && npm run build:windchasers
